metadata.feature_description: Displays statistics about tag usage across community content with pagination support

test_scenarios.scenario_name: View tag statistics for different time periods

steps.expected: Community Analytics page loads with Trending Tags section visible
steps.actual: Community Analytics page loaded successfully showing all module tabs (Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Events, Ideas, Wiki) with Trending Tags section in each

steps.expected: Dropdown shows available time period options
steps.actual: Time period dropdown opened showing options: Day, Week, Month, Year, Custom

steps.expected: Dashboard updates to show monthly tag statistics
steps.actual: Dashboard updated to show monthly view with date range 28 Jan 2026 - 27 Feb 2026

steps.expected: Dashboard updates to show yearly tag statistics
steps.actual: Dashboard updated to show yearly view with date range 28 Feb 2025 - 27 Feb 2026

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test empty state when no tags exist

steps.action: View Trending Tags section with no tag data
steps.expected: Empty state message displayed indicating no tags available
steps.actual: Message 'No trending tags available in selected period' displayed correctly in the Trending Tags section

steps.action: Check Trending Tags section across different module tabs
steps.expected: Empty state should be consistent across all module tabs
steps.actual: Verified Wiki tab shows Trending Tags section with empty state message, consistent with other tabs

steps.action: Attempt to test pagination controls for tag results
steps.expected: Pagination controls visible when tag data exists
steps.actual: No tag data available in the system to test pagination. All Trending Tags sections display empty state message with no pagination controls visible

issues: Cannot test pagination functionality: No tag data exists in the system to populate the Trending Tags section and display pagination controls

steps.action: Attempt to test tag sorting functionality
steps.expected: Sorting options available when tag data exists
steps.actual: No tag data available in the system to test sorting. The Trending Tags section is empty across all modules and time periods

issues: Cannot test sorting functionality: No tag data exists in the system to verify sorting by usage count

steps.action: Attempt to verify tag count accuracy
steps.expected: Tag counts displayed and verifiable against actual usage
steps.actual: No tag data available in the system. Cannot verify tag count accuracy when no tags are displayed

issues: Cannot verify tag count accuracy: No tag data exists in the system to display tag usage counts

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Compare tag usage between time periods

steps.action: Attempt to compare tag usage across different time periods
steps.expected: Tag comparison data visible when switching time periods
steps.actual: No tag data available in any time period (Day, Week, Month, Year). Empty state message 'No trending tags available in selected period' shown consistently

issues: Cannot compare tag usage: No tag data exists in the system across any time period for comparison

observations: The code repository (Dnn.AdminExperience.Evoq.Engage) was empty, preventing code review to understand the exact implementation of the Tag Statistics Analytics feature
The Community Analytics dashboard correctly displays Trending Tags sections across all 6 module types: Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Events, Ideas, Wiki
Time period selection functionality works correctly with Day, Week, Month, Year, and Custom options
The Comparative Term dropdown shows comparison period options (1 y, 1 m, 1 w)
All Trending Tags sections show empty state with message 'No trending tags available in selected period' - this appears to be valid behavior when no tag data exists
Pagination and sorting cannot be tested due to absence of tag data in the system. Consider creating test data (content with tags) to enable comprehensive testing of these features
